item.title: Can someone help me with this
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“pastaway, post:3, topic:420676”]neh errors still

[quote]src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:1445: illegal start of expression
if (c.playerRights <= 1) && (c.playerRights >= 3)){
^
src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:1445: ‘;’ expected
if (c.playerRights <= 1) && (c.playerRights >= 3)){
^
src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:1447: ‘else’ without ‘if’
} else if (c.playerRights == 2){
^
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote][/quote]

                case 8206: 
                       if (c.playerRights <= 1) && (c.playerRights >= 3){
                                c.getDH().sendDialogues(185, 0);
                        } else {
 if (c.playerRights == 2){
                                c.sendMessage("Your rank is too high to participate in the lottery!");
          }
}

item.title: Can someone help me with this
item.dc:creator: @pastaway pastaway
item.description:
@pastaway wrote:

[QUOTE]
case 8206:
if (c.playerRights <= 1) && (c.playerRights >= 3)){
c.getDH().sendDialogues(185, 0);
} if (c.playerRights == 2){
c.sendMessage(“Your rank is too high to participate in the lottery!”);
[/QUOTE]

sorry that im not smart enough to figure this out but im trying to make it send that message when thier player rights are 2 and if thier anything but to like 0,1,3,4,5,6 then it sends the dialogue to the player. how would i set that up? thats what i got above so far but its screwed up miserably :s
